name: MagnifyJoy
0:
”Alexa, Open Magnify Joy.”
”Alexa, Ask Magnify Joy to read me a daily affirmation.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: magnify joy
des: With the Magnify Joy Skill you can hear positive affirmations that will help encourage you and reduce stress. You can hear inspirational quotes to motivate, encourage, and promote a growth mindset. Strengthen your relationship with our Marriage High Five conversation starter questions.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
